content.question:
Listen to the excerpt.

The second chord of the progression is best described as a

choices.label: submediant chord functioning as a predominant chord
subdominant chord in first inversion that has a predominant function
dominant seventh chord in third inversion

content.answer: submediant chord functioning as a predominant chord

unit.text: 5: Harmony and Voice Leading II - Chord Progressions and Predominant Function

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in performed music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
